ValidationRule.description: Project Start Date cannot be before the close date of the opportunity.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(CloseDate > ProjectStartDateTrig__c, $User.IsBypassVR__c = FALSE, NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost") ), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Project Start Date cannot be before the close date of the opportunity [VR26]
